@id.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the Source System object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case ods:SourceSystem

schema:identifier.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the Source System object

ods:fdoType.description: The DOI to the FDO type of the object

ods:status.description: The status of the Digital Object. A digital object can be in Draft, when it is not published yet. Active when it is published and the object is active and Tombstone which means the object has been archived.

schema:version.description: The version of the object, each change generates a new version. The version starts at 1 and each change will increment the version number with 1

schema:name.description: Name of the Source System as provided by the user

schema:description.description: Description of the Source System as provided by the user
examples: The herbarium collection of the University of Coimbra is one of the oldest in Portugal, with specimens dating back to the 18th century.

schema:dateCreated.description: Timestamp of creation. Internally generated, https://schema.org/dateCreated

schema:dateModified.description: Timestamp of last modification. Internally generated, follows the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

schema:url.description: Endpoint from which data may be retrieved

ods:hasFilters.description: List of filters to apply to ingesting from source system. How filters are implemented will vary per translator type.

ltc:collectionManagementSystem.description: The collection management system that the source system is using

ods:translatorType.description: The serialisation of the data the endpoint provides indicating what type of Translator is required. If 'none', no translator is used

ods:maximumRecords.description: An optional parameter to limit the number of records to be ingested from this sourceSystem, it will pick the first X number of records it encounters. If left empty or absent it will process all records.

ods:dataMappingID.description: The Handle of the Mapping Object needed for this Source System

ods:hasTombstoneMetadata.description: Object containing the tombstone metadata of the object. Only present when ods:status is ods:Tombstone
